inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientOfficeInfoV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where ProductReleaseIds contains "O365"
| where UpdatesEnabled notcontains "True"
| project Computer, CollectionTime, UserLoggedOn, ProductReleaseIds, VersionToReport, Platform, ClientCulture, ClientFolder, CDNBaseUrl, OneDriveClientAddon, TeamsAddon, BingAddon, UpdatesEnabled, UpdateChannel
| sort by Computer asc 
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"UPDATING O365 OFFICE NOT ENABLED | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo6470D-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo6470D-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientOfficeInfoV2_CL
| extend OfficeDescription_ = column_ifexists("OfficeDescription", "noata_found")
| extend OfficeVersionBuild_ = column_ifexists("OfficeVersionBuild", "noata_found")
| extend OfficeProductSKU_ = column_ifexists("OfficeProductSKU", "noata_found")

| extend ProductReleaseIds_ = column_ifexists("ProductReleaseIds", "noata_found")
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where OfficeProductSKU_ contains "O365"
| where OfficeUpdateChannelName_ notcontains "Current Channel"

| sort by Computer asc
